title: How to Create Healthy Desserts for Your Family

steps.headline: Dice or slice Slice pineapples, apples, kiwis, strawberries, and a mango into bite-size pieces.
Insert these pieces onto kabob skewers.
steps.description: The rich color of the fruit slices will entice anyone who will see this dessert.

steps.headline: Prepare a low fat cream dip with which your family can dip the kabob for a richer taste.
steps.description: You can also top it with whipped cream.

text: Dice or slice Slice pineapples, apples, kiwis, strawberries, and a mango into bite-size pieces.  Insert these pieces onto kabob skewers. The rich color of the fruit slices will entice anyone who will see this dessert. Prepare a low fat cream dip with which your family can dip the kabob for a richer taste. You can also top it with whipped cream.
